Articles.Content: Mmmmm butter.

> 
> Hype hippo located and in flight:
> [http://worth1000.s3.amazonaws.com/submissions/566000/566496_302d_625x1000.jpg](http://worth1000.s3.amazonaws.com/submissions/566000/566496_302d_625x1000.jpg)

That is a nice hype hippo. Needs more room though.
This Hype Hippo is making Hype Train history.

hyppo:

 ![eM4zzDZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/eM4zzDZ.png)
I think we broke the 0.90 record!

> 
> hyppo:
>  [http://i.imgur.com/eM4zzDZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/eM4zzDZ.png)

The baby hippo is like 'I'm agonna bite yo thumb off!'

> 
> I think we broke the 0.90 record!

And there are 2 more days!
The Hype is so real I gotta wear shades! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Wait, so, will there be a SQUADCAST tonight?

> 
> And there are 2 more days!

Three days for people in europe. :/

The 0.90 thread was 1k+ pages tho.

> 
> Three days for people in europe. :/

This isn't a 'Murica thing. It's three days for us too ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

So what do YOU think Harv's new feature is?

Harv said it was a feature for new players.

> 
> This isn't a 'Murica thing. It's three days for us too ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Ofc everyone to the right, above and below europe too.^^

> I think we broke the 0.90 record!

> 
> [.23.5 thread was 105 pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/73150-The-ARM-megathread)

Welcome to 3rd place!

> 
> Mmmmm butter.

> 
> This is the forum equivalent to holding the world record for eating the most sticks of butter. Please don't set a new personal best.

I see what you did there. stop it you ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Wait, so, will there be a SQUADCAST tonight?

Max said on twitter that he's unsure if he'll have time, so it's a wait and see thing.
![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

[https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/591714349699444736](https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/591714349699444736)

Four page long changelog? Wow, lol!

SQUAD, is that whole thing going to be publicily available? Once 1.0 comes out of course.

The 0.24 hypetrain was the first one I ever saw (since I got KSP at 0.23.5). It was *glorious.* Now all the others disappoint me ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/591714349699444736](https://mobile.twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/591714349699444736)
> Four page long changelog? Wow, lol!
> 
> SQUAD, is that whole thing going to be publicily available? Once 1.0 comes out of course.

Most of it is probably minor stuff, but I'm sure it's a long list anyways. 1.0 is a *big* update.

And to answer your question, I think SQUAD usually releases changelogs, but I'm unsure if they do the whole thing or just major features...

There is a Changelog.txt file on the KSP directory if i'm not mistaken.

This is probably what he refers to
3 mo days.... woow.

> 
> May I ask about what will happen as we near 1.0 station? Obviously the train needs to stop somehow. Also shouldn't we be time traveling at these speeds (I really don't want to arrive at the station thousands of years late)?

Well, last time we kind crashed right through the station walls directly into 0.90, no one was hurt.Why did we crash? *Someone*, not naming any names, forgot to wake me up in time to cut off the meccanopilot. This time I will be wide awake at releasetime and in any event the meccanopilot is now capable of being controled in an emergency by the HypeTrain herself. She has an A.I., you know.

So in any event, the rockets on the caboose can swivel backwards to slow us down from superplaidic speeds down to more reasonable speeds of 100 kilometers per second.

> 
> Well, last time we kind crashed right through the station walls directly into 0.90, no one was hurt.Why did we crash? *Someone*, not naming any names, forgot to wake me up in time to cut off the meccanopilot. This time I will be wide awake at releasetime and in any event the meccanopilot is now capable of being controled in an emergency by the HypeTrain herself. She has an A.I., you know.
> So in any event, the rockets on the caboose can swivel backwards to slow us down from superplaidic speeds down to more reasonable speeds of 100 kilometers per second.

What's the trains name?

> 
> What's the trains name?

HypeTrain, of course.

My current theory is that we only reach lightspeed at the exact moment of release. Then we go from lightspeed to zero speed in one second.

Should be fun!

> 
> HypeTrain, of course.
> My current theory is that we only reach lightspeed at the exact moment of release. Then we go from lightspeed to zero speed in one second.
> 
> Should be fun!

30559883.5Gs. Yay.

> 
> 30559883.5Gs. Yay.

Yeah, but it's spread out over an entire second. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy landings!
